title: Establish Auto-Scaling Kubernetes Infrastructure

business_value: Ensures system reliability under load and optimizes operational costs by leveraging Azure AKS Horizontal Pod Autoscaling (HPA), directly supporting the SLA requirements.

title: Automate Service Request Routing via Geospatial Logic
description: As a Service Center Administrator, I want incoming service requests to be automatically assigned to my center only if the user is located within my specific geofenced service area, so that I only receive relevant jobs and reduce manual dispatching overhead.
business_value: Eliminates manual triage of service requests, reducing assignment latency and ensuring adherence to territorial service agreements using PostGIS spatial queries.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Request Originates Inside Service Polygon","given":"A Service Center has a defined polygon service area in the database","when":"A user creates a service request with coordinates inside that polygon","then":"The system identifies the correct Service Center and automatically assigns the request to it."},{"scenario":"Request Outside All Areas","given":"A user is located in an area not covered by any Service Center polygon","when":"The user submits a service request","then":"The system flags the request for manual review by a Super Admin and triggers an 'Out of Area' alert."}]
technical_tasks: ["Implement Service Request Service state machine","Develop PostGIS ST_Intersects queries for location matching","Create audit logging for routing decisions"]
definition_of_done: ["Routing logic unit tests pass with >80% coverage","Integration tests with mock geospatial data successful","Routing decisions are logged to the audit trail"]

title: Technician Offline Data Synchronization
description: As a Field Technician, I want to view job details and submit updates even when I have no internet connection, so that I can continue working in basements or remote areas without data loss.
business_value: Critical for field operations; prevents data loss and workflow interruptions, ensuring technicians can complete jobs (signatures, notes, status updates) regardless of connectivity.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Offline Job Completion","given":"The mobile device has no network connectivity","when":"The technician marks a job as 'Resolved' and captures a signature","then":"The app stores the data locally in WatermelonDB and queues a sync action."},{"scenario":"Network Restoration Sync","given":"The technician has queued offline actions","when":"The device regains network connectivity","then":"The app automatically synchronizes the queued data to the backend without user intervention and updates the UI to reflect the synced state."}]
technical_tasks: ["Implement WatermelonDB schema and local persistence","Create sync engine with RxJS for queue management","Implement conflict resolution strategies for sync"]
definition_of_done: ["Offline-first architecture implemented and tested","Sync logic handles network interruptions gracefully","No data corruption detected during sync conflict tests"]

title: Service Area Geofencing Interface
description: As a Super Admin, I want to visually draw and edit service center territories on a map, so that I can precisely define coverage areas including complex urban boundaries.
business_value: Provides the necessary data configuration interface for the automated routing engine, replacing error-prone postal code lists with precise geospatial definitions.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Drawing a Service Area","given":"The admin is on the Service Center configuration page","when":"They use the map tool to draw a closed polygon and click save","then":"The system validates the geometry (no self-intersections) and saves the GeoJSON to the backend."},{"scenario":"Editing Existing Boundaries","given":"A service area polygon already exists","when":"The admin drags a vertex to a new position","then":"The map updates immediately and the new coordinates are persisted upon saving."}]
technical_tasks: ["Integrate Mapbox GL JS into Next.js admin portal","Implement polygon drawing and editing tools","Create GeoJSON validation and export logic"]
definition_of_done: ["Map interface functions on supported browsers","GeoJSON output is valid and compatible with PostGIS","UI handles complex polygons without performance lag"]

title: Immutable Audit Logging of Critical Actions
description: As a Compliance Officer, I want an immutable record of all critical system actions (login, data changes, permission updates), so that we can conduct forensic investigations and meet regulatory compliance requirements.
business_value: Ensures security accountability and regulatory compliance (GDPR) by providing a tamper-proof history of all significant platform events.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Admin Changes Permissions","given":"A Super Admin is managing user roles","when":"They elevate a user's privileges","then":"An event is published to the Service Bus and written to the OpenSearch audit index with the actor ID, timestamp, and previous/new values."},{"scenario":"Log Immutability Verification","given":"An audit log entry has been written","when":"An attempt is made to modify or delete the log entry via API","then":"The system rejects the request, as the audit storage is configured as append-only."}]
technical_tasks: ["Develop Audit Service in NestJS","Configure Azure Service Bus consumers for domain events","Implement write-once storage pattern with OpenSearch"]
